content.detailedDescription:
While traveling from the atlanta, ga to the ft. lauderdale area, on the evening of thursday, feb. 18th at around 9:15 p.M., i was driving south on florida's tpke. when i noticed some a light in the sky, off to my left, which caught and held my attention.  i immediately asked myself, "what is that?"  the light i saw was standing still, way up in the air.  i thought that it might be on a tower...But it'd have to be 200 feet up in the sky, and that didn't make sense.  so i kept glancing at it as i drove on, trying to figure out what i was seeing.

i managed to see some light reflected off the object, and i made out that this huge flying object was just hovering in the sky, and the light on it was constant...It was not blinking.  i could not stop anywhere along the road...It was pitch black and it would not have been safe.  so i continued for a few more minutes, constantly checking the object...And i saw what appeared to be a black, very large, boomerang shaped aircraft, with a light, and not moving...Just hovering in the sky.  

unfortunately, when i could finally stop, it was at a very well lighted service area, which prevented me from really getting a good look at the the object.  at that point, it seemed to slowly move off, but i was not able to make out the entire shape of the craft.  

as i got back on the road, i noticed that there were lots of planes in the sky, also off to my left, as i was near an airport, around orlando, fl.  however, as i studied the planes and their lights, it was very clear to me that the light on the object that i saw was not at all like the lights on the planes i was now seeing.  that led me to believe that my eyes were not playing tricks on me.  i had actually seen a huge, unidentified flying object in the sky.  i just wish i could have parked sooner and gotten a good look...And perhaps a snapshot.
content.summary: Saw large, black, boomerang shaped object with blinking lights in night sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming down 1187 from crowley toward benbrook and i saw 3 different sets of lights flying low to the ground, even hovering off to my left.  i kept watching and they would go together and become more disc appearing and separate and swirl around and flash different colors of lights and it continued for probably about 5 minutes or less and they flew off toward the west, and before long they came back toward me and soon after i saw several jets flying after them until i lost sight of them.  they were so cool to see, nothing like i've ever seen before flying around in the sky.  i was excited, i just pulled over on the side of the road so i could watch them as long as i could.  i was happy to hear several reports the next day of other people in the area also seeing them.  i didn't know this network exists until tonight, so i didn't know who to report to that i had also seen them.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 separate entities that would change shape and go together as one, long and straight-looking then disc-like changing colors, fast and slow-moving, dancing low.

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling southbound on us-51 when i saw this aircraft screaming across the sky from east to west. i was about 5 miles north of hazelhurst. i know the photos aren't the greatest but i had little time to react and got lucky because for the most part it was very cloudy. it didn't look like a jet or a rocket. it looked more like a bullet shaped aircraft and had a very thick and solid contrail with a line down the center of it.

at first i thought it was just spraying a chemtrail but afterwards it seemed more like a high speed space plane to me.

it wasted no time on getting out of there and the last photo shows what it left behind.
content.summary: Bullet shaped aircraft screams across northern wisconsin sky.

content.detailedDescription: As you might know ,at the end of the 30-minute news run,they often ask you to stay tuned in the next half hour to see more on a breaking news story.Well this one said they had some unusual film out of pheonix. a craft which appeared to be about 8 city blocks wide was filmed hovering over the city.And then amazingly they showed the film.I saw a huge craft hovering over a city suburb.Then they said more when we come back.Of course that never happened.I watched all the films i can find on the pheonix lights,but none are even close to what i saw that night.This film was broadcast,so maybe you know how to find it
content.summary: Watching overnight news between 1@3 a.M.

content.detailedDescription: At around 12 am i noticed a bright light in the sky and it was flickering different colors.  at first i thought it was just an airplane but it stayed in the sky in the same spot for over 20 minutes.  i got my binoculars out to see if it could tell what it was.  it looked like a ball of light that was shifting colors randomly and at random intervals.  after an hour of looking at it with my binoculars i dusted off my telescope to have a closer look.  to my astonishment it was not just a singular orb of light but many staggered lights in that appeared to be a line.  i was able to observe this light structure for about an hour and a half then clouds moved in and i was no longer able to see it.  it was 5-9 orbs that looked to be in a staggered line.  it looked like the light was reflected and was not self emitted.  the object or objects stayed in the same spot for over 2 hours.  it was in the western sky at about 45 degrees from the horizon.
content.summary: Mutable orbs of different colored light.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my boyfriend were out walking the dog and going towards our local fish and chip shop.  we had just arrived back from a weekend away and were talking about going away again when my boyfriend turned and said 'look at them lucky they must be going somewhere nice referring to a plane that was coming towards us.  when we both looked the object wasn't coming towards us but was hovering.  my boyfriend at this point said thats not a plane.  all i can describe is bright white lights and an irregular shape to that of a plane.  although my sight is not ideal my boyfriend has perfect sight but we could both tell that it was more like an oval shape.  however the light were bright and seemed to sim the eact shape.  it was quite close however there was no sound.  when it started moving slowly to the left and stopped there hovering.  it was definitely not a helicopter as we see quite a few of them locally chasing motorbikes on a local wood area.  i was shouting at my boyfriend to get his phone out so we could take a photo as we were jogging towards it it faded out staying exactly the same size so it was not disapearing moving away but in itself as going transparent.  it then formed itself as solid, hovering all the time and faded again this time not coming back.  there was no lights or zoom it just disapeared leaving us gobsmacked at seeing this but also how close we were to this.
content.summary: Bright whote lights moving slowl y left, large object close shape was like typical ufo shape (oval) however definite shape cannot be given as light were bright

content.detailedDescription:
I am located on se 57th avenue in portland, just off of duke street. last night (12:25 am pst, 21 feb 2010) i was sitting in my living room when i noticed a bright point of light in my upper left peripheral vision. immediately i got up to watch it from the window, and beckoned my mother to do the same. what i beheld was an incredibly bright flashing light in the east-south-eastern sky, moving slowly westward. it moved slower than a plane or helicopter. the pulsation of the light was so fast that i can only describe it as mesmerizing. from the horizon the object must have been about 45 degrees up. it flashed for around 10 seconds before fading down. it took about 1 second to go from brilliantly flashing to dimly glowing. after the flashing i could still make out a faint, uniformly lit shape continuing along the same slow trajectory. after 20 or so seconds i did run outside to observe for noise, but the object was making none that i could hear. no engine noise, no rotors of a helicopter, only the ambiance of my neighborhood at midnight. the object couldn't have been far away, no more than a mile or two; so if it were a conventional aircraft, i would have heard its sound. interestingly i was able to compare the lights of a distant airplane (the occupants of which definitely must have also seen this flashing/glowing object) to this glowing object, and neither resembled each other in any way, shape, or form. eventually my view of the object was obstructed by a neighbor's house and tree, so i made my way to the back patio to watch it more. the object kept hovering slowly west until trees of a nearby campground blocked it from sight. i remember it disappearing in the distance right around orion's belt in the west, just above the douglas firs.

i just want to reiterate: the flashing was bewilderingly bright and very, very rapid. i am somewhat the aviation enthusiast, and i know for a fact that i wasn't watching an airplane's landing lights, emergency lights, flood lights, flares, or anything of the kind. [i also know i wasn't seeing the lights of an airliner head on, as i see that all the time when planes come up from california in the southern sky.] what i saw was pulsating faster than you can blink. the whole object, not just wingtip lights or anything. i know absolutely for certain that this thing was not of astronomical or atmospheric origin. what i saw was crisply observed on a clear, windless night with plenty of stars for background visual reference. i can very confidently say this thing was not a meteor, comet, star, planet, supernova/gamma ray burst, or aurora...It was not a satellite, shuttle, nor the iss or any kind of reentry burn up...It was not a plane, helicopter, blimp or balloon...So with all of those things marked off, what the hell could it possibly be? you tell me. i've never seen anything so brilliant. the lights had an almost fearful yet calming effect on me. even now a couple days later, i'm mesmerized and in awe. 

[i thought i should also add that there are quite a few cell towers in the general vicinity, and there have been reports of black cluster objects hovering stationary near these towers. i feel perhaps all of the transmissions sent and received by these towers attracts ufo activity.]

i'd be happy to provide more details. thank you.
content.summary: February 21st, 2010, 12:25 am: bright flashing light over southeast portland.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i went out to smoke a cigarette and i looked up in the sky and saw a bunch of oragish-red lights in a row in the sky. at first, i thought 'oh my god, are we under attack?' but then realized it was something 'different'. i yelled at my husband to look at them and then i went down my from porch steps because i realized there were more of these lights behind a big evergreen tree (it was blocking my vision of the sky. my husband and i counted 9 of these lights. i yelled at him to get the video camera and within a few more seconds they were just 'gone'.(like it slowly dissappeared) i called 911 and reported strange lights in the sky and they said they would call sac and the air controller to see if they know of anything. i then decided to call ketv channel 7 (this is approximately at 9:30pm)and report it to them. when the main switchboard operator answered he said that 'many people have called in about this' and he asked me if i lived around 90th and fort and blondo area. i said 'yes'. he asked me to describe what i saw. i told him and he said that this is what all of the other callers were describing. he then said that some of the caller's were actually pulling their cars over and looking at them while they called the news station. he then said that they had sent out a reporter to try to get a video or pictures of what we were all seeing and he took my name and phone number down. i stayed up to watch all of the local news stations ( i was flipping back and forth between the2 because the olympic's was on the other) and they didn't mention anything about people calling the station or seeing these 'strange lights'. i went and got a sun morning paper right away the next morning because i was sure there would be a little 'snipit' of this event in the midlands' section-but no such luck. basically, i haven't seen or heard anything re: what these lights were. i know that they weren't 9 planes flying in a row because they were too close to each other and almost 'evenly space'. there was no noise to them, either, and no blinking lights. if this was our military, it's pretty amazing that they had 9 planes flying that close together with no noise--and there may have been more of these lights that i couldn't see because it was cloudy that night and a few could have been behind clouds. i would really just like to know what it was i saw because it has forever changed my life.
content.summary: 9 lights in a row that were 'staggered'

content.detailedDescription:
My 19 year old son and i were walking down a local road in darwen, lancashire,uk at around 9.15pm on the 31st october (yes i know it was halloween. its not a joke... read on !) and i saw 2 glowing red lights moving through the sky to the front above us, which i pointed out to him. we both stopped walking and looked at them to determine whether there were any other lights on the craft... there were none and the glowing red light was continuous on both craft. they looked round in shape. my son was absolutely amazed, as was i.
they were flying in the same straight line direction and were almost side by side and flying at the same speed.
we watched them for a short time before they dissapeared upwards through the clouds. the light was definately too big to be a light on any normal aircraft/helicopter. there was no noise that we could hear and no vapour trail.
after they had dissapeared we talked to each other about it and rationalised it all and we are convinced they were ufo's. we told my wife and our other children (20, 24 and 26 years old)

now this is where it gets really interesting (if not a little scary for me) your 'report' site (above) doesn't allow for this next bit of information... 
the following day my son and i were driving back from birmingham at around 7.30pm on the m6 travelling north and we both saw another one... exactly the same red glowing light, but it was flying much lower and was travelling in a southern direction. (i promise you i am not making this up)... then even more unbelievably, around 2 weeks ago, i had took my son back to his university accommodation and was getting some of his stuff out of my car to take into his room when i saw another one... and 'yes' it was exactly the same ! i saw it flying in a straight line again, and it just went up through the clouds and dissapeared

i swear i am not making any of this up, and my son can confirm the first 2 sightings (he was inside his place for the 3rd and did not see it)

i know what a plane and a helicopter look like at night... and they do not only have a (what would be very large) sole red light (which did not flash).

i have been meaning to report it all since the last sighting, but did not know how to until i saw this facility on your site.
content.summary: We observed 2 round red lights moving close to each other at the same speed in the same direction

content.detailedDescription:
Has anyone reported a sighting yesterday, feb. 18th at 2:00pm?? 
i was in clearwater (coachman carwash off 19n). i was waiting 
along with others outside for our cars to be done. we stood 
outside the storefront. the sky was very blue (except for the 
white streaks - chemtrails?) i always look up. i noticed an 
object that came in over the area...Looked almost white against 
the blue sky. then it just stopped and stayed in one spot for a 
minute or 2. when i saw this i asked the couple next to me 
"what is that?? pointing up at it. the man had regular reading 
glasses on and had to struggle to see it. but i had on my 
sunglasses (polarized) and so did his wife. we both stared at 
it and even she said "i don't know what that is." then it moved 
towards the north, and stopped abruptly again. it was a weird 
shape. not quite round...Definetley not a plane or copter 
either. we watched it move again closer to our location and 
stop on a dime again. we were all watching it. this object, 
against my thumb at arms length, was about the size of a pencil 
eraser. but the shape was strange. also it finally took off to 
the north again, and the sun reflected off it momentarily and 
it gleemed, only for a second...Then i knew it was metal. it 
shot away and went behind one of those "streak" lines in the 
sky, and we didn't see it after that. sorry did not have a camera!
content.summary: Object staying still in sky

content.detailedDescription:
My partner and myself were visiting the asa-wright nature center on sunday the 21st of febuary.We were there for aproximately 3 hours.During the entire day we had been taking photograghs of the country side and towns.Upon leaving we continued taking photo's,i pointed out an orange colored floweing poui tree and took a photo,it took us about 1 1/2 hours to get back to where were were staying.As usual i uploaded the photograghs to my computer and while looking through them i noticed what appeared to be a spot on one of the photo's.I checked all the photo's of the day and there was not anything simular on the other photo's,checked and double checked all the photo's and am left with an unexplained object on the one photo.I am interested to if possible have the photo reviewed.

thank you  rr
content.summary: While driving from an ecotourist reservation the asa-wright nature reserve i took a photo of a tree,later after uploading the photo's i saw this object in the picture

content.detailedDescription: See attached article
content.summary: Flying at night - saw bright light approaching for several minutes-came directly at my plane and abruptly reversed course and exhibited tangible form in the darkness. an absolute near miss.

content.detailedDescription: Leaving to pick up my wife at on february 19th 2010 at 2:45 eastern standard time i stopped to look at the moon. i have been trying to get a good photograph of it for some time. i saw a small red spark shoot off the moon in the northerly direction from my perspective. it was red and very fast. i don't know if it was more than half a second but about that, that it traveled about 5 times the visual thickness of the moon. then the red faded and i lost track of it. i have no description of the craft it was too far away.
content.summary: Spark shot from the moon incredibly fast and small to the naked eye

content.detailedDescription:
Attention morgan beall
 we were driving home to lbk longboat key fl on 53 ave headin west we all saw the lights from 34th st and 53 av back then was all cow pasture at the corner (the road went west and then went 90 deg turn to north  and connectetd to cortez rd at about 75th street or so). from 34th it looked like some big lights very low at corner(looked like the interstate lights)we thoght perhaps they installed some lighting as they have had numerous accidents at corner. but as we got closer we could see it was an arrowhead shaped vehicle about 1000 ft up maybe lower. it had 3-5 very large lights that formed a shape of a v at the front(i assume front) as we got right up on it we were stunned! it was amazing at the bottom a light would flash and i could see the bottom and it wasnt like any airplane it was kinda boxy with texture not sleek and smooth, no faa lights and it never moved(from what we could tell) we were a little to the south of it but we were very close(probably throw a rock and hit it). we rolled the windows  down and was drivin at about 10 mph no one else on road at the time thats what was freaky there was no sound ad i mean no sound not a whir clink nuthin. i have heard and seen planes gliders hot air ballons helicopters blimps and they all made some noise and they were all farther away than this object. we were freakin at this time we were sayin to each other "are we all seein this are you seein this!!?!?" we were scared as we were in cow pasture( cow mutilations) so we wernt about to stop. we drove the entire length of that area until it was out of sight(shortly after turning onto cortez) and it never moved. we thought we would just go home and see it on the news and it would be open for discussion. never saw a thing about it. it wasnt until i saw a show on disc channel( a few years ago) that had a report of these police in like 5 counties and what they described was nearly identical to our expeirence. i am clear it was nothing convetional. i assumed it was military as we are just south of mcdill afb and the stratigic air command sac. i dont have ay video or pics but i could probaly draw a sketch but i have recently leared of a military tr3-b and it does look a lot like that. regardless i have seen many unexplained lights in the sky and what not but this was the real deal it was low and clearly visible and close. it was wtinesed by me, my wife, my step daughter , and her fiance'. the first three are here and willing to share their expierence, and without to much effort the fourth would probably do the same. i will never forget it i doubt he will either. we aint no yuppies or fine upstanding citizens but this we saw without a doubt, no lie, no hallucination! i would love to contribute anything you thought would be helpful as we wanted to the next day but we didnt know were to go or who to tell. it is real and i belive is leading up to some very important events. i look foward to talkin to you and right now my step daughter is staying with us so we 3 are available. the fourth party we havent been in touch with for years.Please feel free to contact me carl e zahrndt, jr
content.summary: Attention morgan beall 4 people witnessed an arrowhead shaped object low altitude no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I received a call one night from my friend billy and he was watching a star dance in the sky over clovis ca. and wanted me to go in my back yard and witness what he was watching in the night sky . so i went into my back yard with two lady friends of mine and we witness by then a building floating over the city in clovis , california . i told billy i talk to him later and so i hung up the phone . i was in total awe to the size and the aray of lights going around this thing . it look like a building with deep red lights going around it in the clock wise posion . well i  watched it for about 5 minutes traveling south bound out of clovis to kings county . this has been the closes i've been to a ufo in all my life and me and the ladies still talk about it to this day . i think it is government myself , but i could be wrong . 

well that is all i have right now to share . i've seen alot more ufo's too before that over clovis area . the people i've been talking too have been seeing alot in the night skies  and coming down to the mountains in the clovis area . there are alot of strange things going on in the night skies in the central valley . 

i even witness a metalic cigar shape thing above clovis back in feb. 2008 . i was standing in the front yard with a friend and in the day light looing up and the south vally out of clovis calif. i seen jets coming up from the south , but this one did'nt have fins or wings on it and boy was it long . i told my friend about it and he said to me yeah it's a plan and then i told him look again and see it you can see any fins or wings on it . well he looked again and he was in shock to see a cigar shape plane or what ever you want to call it and we talked just a couple of seconds and then it was traveling east bound without banking in the sky . it did a 90 degree trun without banking in the sky and we both were in awe then . everytime we see each other now we talk about what we've seen in the day time skies over clovis calif. 

thank you for your time and i hope this can help you our alittle bit . may yahweh bless mufon and all that it does .........   yhwh ......
content.summary: A building flying over my city

content.detailedDescription:
The subject was taking an early morning walk and was compelled to look east.  saw object.  took shot number one with camera phone.  brief time period.  actually saw the image - it wasn't a reflection.

object in shot #1 disappeared then re-appeared to the left and further away - near the ground in second #2 as a solid orb - it appears to be light emitting.  the third shot shows the object taking off to the right.

the individual was in central florida and must remain anonymous.  the person shared the photos with me.  she experienced a brief sensation of "timelessness".  she said she really didn't "feel" anything.

you may contact me.
content.summary: Subject was on an early morning walk.  turned in an eastward direction.  saw the object.  snapped three shots with camera phone.

content.detailedDescription:
My fiance and i were driving between central scotland to the tayside region, having been home to visit out parents for the weekend.  whilst driving up the motorway on a clear night, we noticed 2 orange lights in the sky up ahead.  i pointed them out to my other half, as i thought they were planets, as the sky was so clear, but they were very different in colour to the multitude of stars which were present.

as we got closer, it became apparent that they were not planets, but were in motion, albeit, very slowly.  i figured they were perhaps aircraft, or possibly small lanterns with candles which had been set off from the ground (often done over here on november 5th for guy fawkes night).

as we got even closer, my other half turned to me with a very perplexed look and asked me if i had any idea what the hell they were.  they were moving against the wind, at very slow speed, but were low enough in the sky to not be distant satellites/high flying aircraft.  they were also flying fairly close to one another (scale uncertain, but perhaps a few '00 metres apart).  as they passed over the car, they disappeared very suddenly from view, despite the clarity of view my fiance had from the car window, which further added confusion to what we were seeing.

there are no airbases round about this motorway, and the objects were very distinctive in the way they moved.  the motorway also passes very close to the scottish town of bonnybridge, which is no doubt very famous amongst the members of your group (i initially perhaps thought an overactive imagination, but there's no reason my fiance would know about the reputation of this area).

my fiance and i are both research academics at a top university in scotland - i do believe in the existence of ufo's, but my partner has always been highly sceptical - after this evening, she was extremely puzzled and a little frightened by what we had just witnessed.

i do not necessarily want to state that i believe this to have been any form of space-craft, but the objects moved in a very unusual manner, and by their very definition, were definately "unidentifiable" despite the clarity of the evening sky!

as i was driving, i have no photos to validate the sighting, but thought i should share my experience regardless.

bizarre indeed!
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: 2x small orange lights flying parallel at very slow speed - clear sky and low flying

content.detailedDescription:
There were exquisite big, bright lights but i couldnt describe the color, the ships color was an almost blackish muddy brown



i was at my house and plating world of warcraft
 and i notived a huge airbooming screech
i first thought it was a test flight but it didnt look like a plane.
it was sort of swirling around and the lightts were flashing off and on
i kinda felt a bit sick in the stomach with a burning thing in my chest
but after i lost sight all of the feelings went away making me feel drained wth no emotion. i lost sight of the object after i fell to my knees, writhing in agony.
content.summary: Large, bright

content.detailedDescription: I was jogging on the pinellas trail heading towards clearwater beach. it was 1:47pm. it was maybe 70 degrees and almost completely clear sky. as i was jogging i notice this enormous object directly ahead of me. i finally realize it's a giant whitish looking color triangle. im no pilot but im guessing to altitude to be 5000 ft maybe..Give or take. very low. there's 3 giant lights on the bottom. 2 red and one white. the first red one lit up so bright and then dimmed, then the 2nd red light lit up and dimmed, then the white. it repeated that cycle about every 20 seconds or so i think. 2 other ufo's were behind it. they were brighter than stars by far. they were just solid white. another solid white light was in front of the triangle. as i stood there watching this a second triangle with the red and white lights became visible and disappeared within a flash. it did this 2 or 3 times. the triangle hovered silently for approx. 5 minutes then began to gain altitude. the top of it seemed to be moving or shifting or something. it was strange. im not sure how to describe it. the lights remained still and covered most of the bottom of the craft. but the top was odd.  i watched the triangle for 12 minutes. even when it was extremely high altitude you could still see the lights flashing in sequence.It eventually got so high up i decided to get back to my run. i woulda stayed for ever, it was awesome. talk about the time not to have a video camera..Would of ended the debate for good. personally im leaning towards this being military craft, given the number of bases around this area. macdill also has some rumors of secret craft and thats approx 20 mins away. but why fly that thing, that low on a clear blue sky over clearwater beach area at the warmest part of the afternoon when the beach is packed with people laying on their backs looking up???????????? i jog that trail alot and will continue to look up..
content.summary: 5 ufos. one close...Big whitish triangle.

content.detailedDescription: The sighting occurred on a side street in an industrial neighborhood, a few blocks from the intersection of capital and palmer in milwaukee, wi.  a friend was in a meeting with a local community organization and i decided to stay in the car to make some work related phone calls.  i had just finished up with the phone calls when i decided to step out of the car for a cigarette.  i leaned up against the driver-side door of the car facing the south as i smoked.  i noticed movement some movement to my right, and looked in that direction.  an object anywhere from 4 to 5.5 feet long oriented perpendicular to the ground like so: | was floating about 15 feet off the ground.  the object was moving from the west to the east at about 6 - 8 miles per hour with a very shallow guide slope, about 1 degree.  at first i thought that the object might be a kite cut loose from its string with how smoothly and quietly it was gliding along, until it passed underneath some power lines and a few feet later it ascended vertically by about 5 feet to clear the top of a building that it was headed for. it then moved parallel to the top of the building for about 300 feet until my view of the object became obstructed by another taller building to my left.  the object was an imperfect cylindrical shape with a few small protrusions here and there.  when i realized that the object was not a wayward kite, i thought about reports of flying humanoids.  however, the protrusions didn't seem to fit with what was described in those accounts - additionally there was a brief metallic flash as light from a lamppost reflected off of the object - this does not seem to fit with the description of flying humanoids either.  other than the brief metallic flash the object was entirely black.  the closest the object's path took it to me was about 120 feet and i was able to observe the object for about 2 minutes, so i had ample opportunity to try to identify the object and for the life of me i cannot think of anything that this object could have been.  even after going home and doing a google image search for uavs nothing i have ever seen can match up with the description of this object.  my reaction to this object was initially one of pure curiosity until after i had dropped my friend off at his place, then i became extremely nervous and scared.
content.summary: Humanoid shaped object moving at a slow speed, low altitude, no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
I awoke @ 5:36 to a light in my window facing north pre dawn. i was glad as i was hoping to see a meteor this morning i grabbed my binoculars, which i keep by the door and i went outside and i was looking at the dipper facing south looking almost straight up with binoculars pre dawn. i am an avid photographer, prior military and in the civil air patrol i am a trained observer in search and rescue. i can't describe this as anthing i have seen before moving faster than a jet and of the glide path into seattle and well i don't know.
i lit a cigarette.
a sphere shaped object became visible in the western sky moving from from west to east it took about 4 minutes to move across the sky during this time in its wake its path was almost if not exactly duplicated by a bell shaped object it seemed to be chasing at a distance during this time there was a meteor that fell right in between them. i lit another cigarette, i went back in to chek the time and it was 6:06am there flight pattern reminded me of an a-10 on attack run dropping flares  well the flares were as bright as the objects and the objects were indeed low in the sky but they were flying it seemed straight 46.831431 -122.547512 elevation about 472 feet. the things that struck me as odd was the fact that was no nature sounds frogs stopped the owls stopped the roosters stopped at all not even the frogs  their illumination did not vary nor did it brighten the sky as a low earth satellite's do e.G. iridium at sunset usually put on quite a show.
content.summary: Pre dawn objects split a meteor

content.detailedDescription:
Four bright lights approached from the horizen in the west heading in a easterly direction. as they were almost overhead. object one and three deviated from a straight line formation and slowly moved to the south for a few seconds while still staying in motion heading east as a group of four objects. the first and third objects slowly moved back to the north and fit back in a straight line with the other two objects. after a few seconds, object two and four deviated from a straight line formation and slowly moved to the south for a few seconds while still staying in motion heading east as a group of four objects. the four objects continued to move in this zig/zag fashion for four cycles then once back in line they accelerated east across the sky in a flash!

being in a pilot ground school at the time, when four objects appeared in close proximity to one another i thought small aircraft may be violating seperation rules and this caught my attention. then the four objects beguan to zig/zag with object one and three moving off line and back the object two and four. this was unexplainable to an exact situation? then after a few zig/zags they lined up and accelerated forward in a flash. nothing man made flying could come close to resemble this.
content.summary: Formation pattern movement , line up and accelerate in a flash

content.detailedDescription:
I have to smoke outside and on the early morning of feb. 20 at 5:15 am, i went out for a cigarette.  it was a very clear night at the time.  there were many stars which i looked up to see.  as i finished my smoke, i noticed up to my left a bright star like object travel from behind the house heading east.  it was silent with no blinking lights.  i was amazed and watch but a second later, a larger light came out travelling slightly behind the smaller one.  i walked out onto the drive to see them better.  the larger one slowed down as i walked out but then kept going.  the lights were definitely not planes as there were no blinking lights.  i thought right away these were different.  as the lights got across the sky to above the trees at beginning of property, i saw a commercial plane with blinking lights coming from the northeast.  the two lights flew directly across the flight path of the plane.  not sure if you can check into what plane was in the vacinity at this time but they also must have seen the two lights.  the lights then faded into the tree line across the property.  i was very excited at what i had just seen but was disappointed i did not go into the house to get my binoculars for a better look.  i was afraid i would miss the sighting.

please check to see what the commercial plane was at the time these objects flew by.  this might also be on radar from logan or tf green.
content.summary: Two lights, one small and one larger travelled over my house from west to east

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving some store or place like that and as i went outside i happened to have something compell me to look up in the sky..As i did i happened to see the "plane" coming in like an airliner landing but if leveled off and banked to the right and slowed a little incoming.After it leveled off it was directly overhead where i could see a distinct outline..With three lights..Pale amber colored..One at the tip of the nose and two at the wing tips..It had to be at least small airliner size..Like a 727.No sound..Very low.Thought it was an sr-71 but i knew those arent flying anymore.It then flew at a good clip twards the framingham correctional from the licoln street worcester area..Very fast twards the horizon and disappeared.I was shocked and amazed about the shape..Only saw something close in a ufo book.Didnt think id see one for real.A little anxious/nervous..
content.summary: Close to a sr-71 or spaceshuttle with short wings molded as part of body

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i went on our back porch to smoke before turning in for the night. to the south of our house, we witnessed what appeared to be an exceptionally bright star with flashes of red and blue light. the object remained stationary for approximately five minutes and then began a series of movements to the right, left, and towards us. 

over the next thirty minutes it moved, in relation to the treeline and our location, closer and to the west eventually passing out of sight. when this object moved it was clearly noticable, making rapid movements to the west or east and then stopping in place (the treeline made an excellent baseline for observations). 

over the course of the event, a meteorite and a plane passed between us and the object giving us a rapid and slow comparison. i have never seen a plane that could manuever in this manner and i am familiar with helicopters and their movements. this was not a conventional plane or helicopter. i have never seen an object that moved in this manner. we were unable to film the object because we do not have a video camera and our digital cameras lack decent zoom.
content.summary: Witnessed a light, similar to a star (but with blue and red lights) move slowly south to west from our backyard over a 45 minute duration.

content.detailedDescription:
Got an instant message from a friend of my brothers online saying he saw something near a small resivouir near where he lives..Its not to far from where i live so i went outside to see if i could see something..Went out to the backyard and thats when i saw it..Low flying,no sound,first glowing close to street light colored..It flew a little bit below the treeline around our neighborhood..Circled about 4 times around the area like it was looking for something..Before it dissappeared behind the treeline in our backyard it turned to a brite white after the third time it circled before it dissappeared.
im suprised no one else saw it besides me,my brother,and my mom,we thought it mightve been a baloon or something at first..But it flew at a consistant elevation..And didnt float.I was quite shocked..A little scared too and excited along with awe.Could see a slight dark disk outline contrast above the glowing..It looked like a really flat cieling light almost.Quite strange,never saw anything like that since.
content.summary: Glowing, street light color to brite white, glowing on bottom, dark slim outline on top.

content.detailedDescription: While at a stop light, i looked up in the southern direction.  we were at hillsdale and ross making a left. we were in south san jose at the time. i was on the passenger side.  i snapped four to 5 pics of this object in the sky from my cell phone. as we were entering the parking lot, it suddenly vanished!
content.summary: It was a dark solid triangular shape.  it was not a kite!  it was still!!!

content.detailedDescription: a plane. the windows weren't lit up. it was so fastand totally silent. no one else was with me. i came in and told my co-workers,pam and chris,they laughed at me, and said "it was the space shuttle, it's suppose to land this morning." i was raised around aircraft,my dad was a flight instructor for the air force. for a more precise date you could look back to a night  the space shuttle was landed about 5a. i can't remember an exact date. it wasn't a stealth aircraft, i've seen pictures of these. if it was an experimental aircraft of some sort, it was strange. i do live about 50 mi. south of cape kennedy. i never knew of this network, just found it tonight on my laptop. it disappeared over the apartment complex behind the nursing home,where i worked as a nurse,over the treetops,not seen again.
content.summary: While sitting in garden area in back of consulate healthcare.

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling north on us 151 in downtown dubuque, ia when noticed a leading edge black line event moving west at a high rate of speed. prior to that i was seeing a near total white-out south of town from aeresol spraying which looked like it was from four different contrails or sources.

the previous night i was in maquoketa and was seeing extremely heavy metalic particles suspended in air and vibrating with an amber or iodine looking tint right after sunset. they had been falling from the sky the entire afternoon.
content.summary: Leading edge black line effect over dubuque, iowa.

content.detailedDescription:
I was a child 8-12 yrs. old playing kickball at the 2nd house se of milner rd. & chamberlain rd. a short distance n of the 181st air natl' guard near hulman airport near my home. this was during a warm-weather month.  i saw this object in the sky & watched it on & off for 5-15 min.  it was shiny, silver & round (not sure if it was circular or disc-shaped); i was puzzled because it didn't look like an airplane. i kept looking back at it to be sure of this. i was very familar w/the appearances of airplanes due to growing up so near an airport. i didn't see it when it left or disappeared due to the game. i told my mother about it as soon as i got home, but she discounted it. i've wondered about it every since.
(note: yrs. later when i was a teenager i saw a large,bright-orange round object in the sky at dusk that was over the same airport.  i was driving on e. wabash ave. near the intersection of wabash & brown avenues. in terre haute & quickly pulled into a parking lot to look at it longer.  although it was near sunset, this object was east from my location. i was alarmed enough by this sight that i strongly considered driving closer to the object, but i didn't really have the time to do so & finally convinced myself that it may have been some unusual weather phenomena, etc.
also, when i was in my 30s my husband saw an round, circular silver? object on the ground or hovering just above the ground on the nw corner of the property at the intersection of old maple ave. & hunt rd when he was traveling home. in terre haute--vigo co.  he said he also heard a strange humming sound then. he paused for quite a while at the stop sign as he faced e. trying to make sense of this object. this was in the early a.M. hrs. not sure of the date or time of year. he told me about it the next morning, but refused to report it--strongly wished to remain anonymous. do not mention this to him or contact him about this.)
 all three of these sightings were of objects in the e. glenn area of terre haute,in--very near or fairly near the 181st air natl' guard & hulman airport.
content.summary: Saw a shiny silver round object in sky near 181st air natl'l guard
